bibl.title: List of invitees [to Hench's honorary degree ceremony], [1940]

div1.p: This list records Hench's friends and relatives who are to be invited to the ceremony awarding him an honorary Washington and Jefferson College degree.

div1.head: List of invitees [to Hench's honorary degree ceremony], [1940]
div1.p:
Friends and relatives of Dr. Hench, to whom if possible, we would like to have
invitations sent:
RELATIVES:
Mrs. J. B. Hench, 5524 Kentucky Avenue, Pittsburgh, Pa.
Dr. and Mrs. A. L. Hench, East Jefferson Street, Charlottesville, Virginia.
Mr. and Mrs. Samuel N. Hench, Marlinton, West Virginia.
Mr. and Mrs. Norman M. Hench, 14 West Elm Street, Apt. 1403, Chicago, Ill.
Mr. and Mrs. J. B. Ramsey, 219 Harvard Street, Brookline, Mass.
Mrs. H. P. Davis and family, 1221 Franklin Avenue, (Wilkinsburg) Pittsburgh, Pa.
Mr. and Mrs. George C. Hench, Elkhart, Indiana.
Mrs. J. H. Kahler, 527 Fourth Street, S.W., Rochester, Minn.
Dr. and Mrs. J. E. Crewe, 801 Third St. S.W.
ASSOCIATES IN ROCHESTER:
Dr. and Mrs. A. M. Snell, 709 Ninth Avenue. S. W.
Dr. and Mrs. E. H. Rynearson, Sunnyslopes
Dr. and Mrs. E. V. Allen, 427 Fifth Avenue S. W.
Dr. and Mrs. John Berkman, 12th Avenue S. W.
Dr. and Mrs. Philip W. Brown, 729 Sixth Street, S. W.
Dr. and Mrs. Winchell McK. Craig, 828 Eighth St. S.W.
Dr. and Mrs. Howard K. Gray, College Apartments.
Dr. and Mrs. Charles H. Slocumb, 723 Ninth Street S.W.
Dr. and Mrs. E. F. Rosenberg, 319 Fifth Avenue S. W.
Dr. and Mrs. Haddow M. Keith, 814 Fifth Street S. W.
Dr. and Mrs. A. H. Logan, 503 Ninth Avenue S. W.
Dr. and Mrs. Andrew Rivers, 819 Fourth St. S. W.
Sister M. Pantaleon, St. Mary's Hospital

Dr. and Mrs. Dwight L. Wilbur, 490 Post Street, San Francisco, Cal.

Dr. and Mrs. Winfield L. Butsch, 333 Linwood Ave., Buffalo, N. Y.
Dr. and Mrs. Louis S. Faust, 1104 Republic Building, Denver, Col.
Dr. and Mrs. Frank Edmundson, 5317 Fifth Avenue, Pittsburg, Pa.
Dr. and Mrs. E. B. Rentschler, 239 N. Fifth St., Reading, Pa.
Dr. and Mrs. Theodore R. Bliss, 428 Ohio Building, Akron, Ohio.
Mr. and Mrs. Lucius Seiberling, 97 Mayfield Avenue, Akron, Ohio.
Dr. John Garvin, Jenkins Arcade, Pittsburgh, Pa.
Dr. and Mrs. William A. Bradshaw, 121 University Place, Pittsburgh, Pa.
Dr. and Mrs. W. W. G. Maclachlan, Medical Arts Bldg., Fifth Ave., Pittsburgh, Pa.
Dr. and Mrs. Alex H. Colwell, 121 University Place, Pittsburgh, Pa.
Dr. and Mrs. Grover C. Weil, 5867 Wilkins Ave., Pittsburgh, Pa.
Dr. and Mrs. Alexander McEwen, Northern Pacific Beneficial Assn. Hosp., St. Paul,
Minn.
Dr. and Mrs. Walter Kirch, 5301 Grand Ave., Doz Noines, Iowa
Mr. William McConahey, 3366 Park Avenue, Indianapolis, Indiana.
Mr. and Mrs. William L. Church, 5206 Ellsworth Ave., Pittsburgh, Pa.
Mrs. William L. McEwen, 5534 Kentucky Ave., Pittsburgh, Pa.
FRIENDS AND FORMER ASSOCIATES, Continued:
Mr. W. S. Johnston, 709 South Negley Avenue, Pittsburgh, Pa.
Mr. and Mrs. George Colvin, 1080 Chestnut Street, Coraopolis, Pa.
Mr. S. L. Tone, 5305 Westminster Place, Pittsburgh, Pa.
Mr. and Mrs. W. Z. Morrison, 746 Quinby Avenue, Wooster, Ohio.

Mrs. Rose Rynearson, 5620 Howe Street, Pittsburgh, Pa.
Mr. and Mrs. Albert Kennedy Rowswell, 906 Bessemer Bldg., Pittsburgh, Pa.
Mr. and Mrs. George Arnett, River Road, Yardley, Pa.

Mrs. Marian Troost, The Plaze Apts., Mankato, Minn.

Mr. and Mrs. Bart Stewart,

Mr. and Mrs. Karnahan Sciberling, The Farm, Northfield, Ohio.
